name: Outro
commands: I'm fine... Fine.|...This is war, isn't it?|It's not at all like the games I used to play with my brother or Lyon.|I never thought-- I didn't know it would be this...savage.|Are words useless? Is strength all that matters? It's so sad...|Why would the Grado Empire do this? To what end would they start a war?
...Don't worry, Seth. I won't give in to sorrow.|Let's get moving.|I'm not broken, and I won't stop until I see Renais restored.|I won't stop until I'm reunited with my father and brother.
source:
transition;Close
change_background;Forest
transition;Open
add_portrait;Seth;Left;no_block
add_portrait;MC;Right
speak;Seth;Princess, are you injured?
speak;MC;What?|Oh, no...{br}I'm fine, Seth.
speak;Seth;But you look so pale...
speak;MC;I'm fine... Fine.|...This is war, isn't it?|It's not at all like the games I used to play with my brother or Lyon.|I never thought-- I didn't know it would be this...savage.|Are words useless? Is strength all that matters? It's so sad...|Why would the Grado Empire do this? To what end would they start a war?
speak;Seth;Princess...
speak;MC;...Don't worry, Seth. I won't give in to sorrow.|Let's get moving.|I'm not broken, and I won't stop until I see Renais restored.|I won't stop until I'm reunited with my father and brother.
transition;Close
